definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Scabs are finally growing over Wall Street's gaping wounds.
sentences.chinese: 華爾街那些大大小小的傷口終於開始結痂癒合了。

sentences.english: We talked to maybe two dozen companies, big and small.
sentences.chinese: 我們可能於近24家大大小小的公司溝通過。

sentences.english: He investigates complaints large and small that come to him from all levels of society.
sentences.chinese: 他要調查來自社會各個階層的大大小小的冤屈不平。

sentences.english: The wild animals, large and small, all fled for their lives.
sentences.chinese: 大大小小的野獸都嚇得撒腿就逃。

sentences.english: What is one to do when one realises that thought.
sentences.chinese: 如果一個人認識到了，思想是針對大大小小的挑戰。

sentences.english: To It there is no big or little problem.
sentences.chinese: 而且根本不存在任何大大小小的問題。

sentences.english: He pursued ardently all the major and minor pleasures of life.
sentences.chinese: 他熱烈追求生活中所有大大小小的樂趣。

sentences.english: Consumers are once again reverting to a need for personalization from businesses large and small.
sentences.chinese: 消費者再次從大大小小的企業回到個人化經營。

sentences.english: They endure the daily humiliations -- large and small -- that come with occupation.
sentences.chinese: 他們每天忍受着由佔領帶來的大大小小的羞辱。
大大小小的珠母貝鈕釦。

sentences.english: There are some big or small surprize.
sentences.chinese: 人生有大大小小的驚喜。

sentences.english: The updated version of the dark ride adds big and small video screens to the shoot-em-up attraction.
sentences.chinese: 升級版的黑暗之旅在槍戰環節加入了大大小小的屏幕。

sentences.english: Carvings at the Bayon temple record events large and small from Angkor's past.
sentences.chinese: 巴戎寺牆上的雕刻訴說着吳哥城過去大大小小的事件。

sentences.english: But, greatly small now steel ironworks production of put into high gear.
sentences.chinese: 但是，現在大大小小的鋼鐵廠又都開足馬力生產。

sentences.english: So did thousands of smaller stores.
sentences.chinese: 數以千計大大小小的唱片店也都關門大吉了。

definition: lit. their number cannot be counted (idiom); fig. countless/innumerable
lit. each color and each form (idiom)/diverse/various/all kinds of
to cover the whole (area)/to be found throughout
all kinds of/all sorts of/every (different) kind of
hundreds/a large number/lit. by the hundreds and thousands
numerous and close together/densely packed/thickly dotted/thick/dense
